nascent: There is no current focus on evaluation.
emerging: The Impact Management Capability identifies the need to drive regular evaluation to support internal learning.
expanding: The importance of evaluation is not yet widely prioritized within the organization.
optimising: Key evaluation questions are valued within the organization.
mature: Evaluation of effectiveness is embedded across approaches and practices of the organization.

nascent: Evaluation is only considered when required by funders / investors.
emerging: There are little to no resources allocated towards evaluation.
expanding: Resource allocations remain low unless externally provided.
optimising: There is advocacy for resource mobilization to embed evaluative thinking.
